name: Tui
description: Twitter client based on mobile.twitter.com in menu bar

packageJSON.name: tuitter
packageJSON.description: Twitter client based on mobile.twitter.com in menu bar

releases.name: v0.4.12
releases.body:
# Changes

- Fix cancelling edit a new tweet
- Fix back button

# How to install

### Mac

Unarchive Tui.app and put it to your `Applications` directory.

### Linux

Unarchive the file and make symlink from `Tui-linux-*-x.y.z/Tui` to `/usr/local/bin/tui` or execute `Tui` directly.

### Windows

Unarchive the file and execute `Tui.exe` directly.

releases.name: v0.4.11
releases.body:
# Changes

- Fix detecting tweets in timeline
- Fix killing promotion tweets
- Fix header area
- Reload web contents when memory usage is too high (configurable)
- Fix `unfocus-tweet`
- Update dependencies

# How to install

### Mac

Unarchive Tui.app and put it to your `Applications` directory.

### Linux

Unarchive the file and make symlink from `Tui-linux-*-x.y.z/Tui` to `/usr/local/bin/tui` or execute `Tui` directly.

### Windows

Unarchive the file and execute `Tui.exe` directly.

releases.name: v0.4.10
releases.body:
# Changes

- Improve 'New Tweet' popup placement
- Fix various selectors for selecting parts in app
- Fix notification
- Improve open-tweet (open activity)
- New tweet from menu
- Tweak application icon

# How to install

### Mac

Unarchive Tui.app and put it to your `Applications` directory.

### Linux

Unarchive the file and make symlink from `Tui-linux-*-x.y.z/Tui` to `/usr/local/bin/tui` or execute `Tui` directly.

### Windows

Unarchive the file and execute `Tui.exe` directly.

releases.name: v0.4.7
releases.body:
# Changes

- Improve selecting next/previous item with focus
- Improve focusing first item
- Support new look (type C)
- Reset focus on switching tab
- Fix scrolling aligning to header
- Fix normal window on Windows
- Fix menu items on Windows
- Fix quitting app on Windows and Linux

# How to install

### Mac

Unarchive Tui.app and put it to your `Applications` directory.

### Linux

Unarchive the file and make symlink from `Tui-linux-*-x.y.z/Tui` to `/usr/local/bin/tui` or execute `Tui` directly.

### Windows

Unarchive the file and execute `Tui.exe` directly.

releases.name: v0.4.1
releases.body:
# Changes
- Added multi-accounts support
- Support `theme.css` in addition to `user.css`
- Internal refactorings (creating `MainApp` and `RendererApp` classes, manage many states with class instances, ...)
- Changed some keymap names _Breaking Change_
- Support fullscreen window even if it's in menubar mode
- New `onKeymap` hook for plugins
- Some new keymappings
- New logo (saying sorry to esa...)

# How to install:

### Mac

Unarchive Tui.app and put it to your `Applications` directory.

### Linux

Unarchive the file and make symlink from `Tui-linux-*-x.y.z/Tui` to `/usr/local/bin/tui` or execute `Tui` directly.

### Windows

Unarchive the file and execute `Tui.exe` directly.

releases.name: v0.1.0
releases.body:
First archive release.

How to install:

### Mac

Unarchive Tui.app and put it to your `Applications` directory.

### Linux

Unarchive the file and make symlink from `Tui-linux-*-x.y.z/Tui` to `/usr/local/bin/tui` or execute `Tui` directly.

### Windows
